p: A highly favorable alternative, however, would be to recover selexol for commercial or reuse purposes. The exegetical requirements for industrial utilities are also increasing especially for the process of hydrogen, biodiesel, and glycerin production. The gasification stage contributes significantly to this increase due to their high requirements in terms of heat and work exergy. Therefore, it is not appropriate at this time to establish a criterion to determine the application or viability of the cases under study. Each of the proposals has been evaluated individually and it has been possible to determine the critical stages to suggest potential improvements.
